00023    // Constructor.
00024    McMoveManager::McMoveManager(McSimulation& simulation)
00025    : Manager<McMove>(),
00026      simulationPtr_(&simulation),
00027      systemPtr_(&simulation.system()),
00028      randomPtr_(&simulation.random())
00029    {}
00030 
00031    // Destructor
00032    McMoveManager::~McMoveManager()
00033    {}

00038    Factory<McMove>* McMoveManager::newDefaultFactory() const
00039    {  return new McMoveFactory(*simulationPtr_, *systemPtr_); }
00040 
00041    /* 
00042    * Read instructions for creating objects from file.
00043    */
00044    void McMoveManager::readParam(std::istream &in)
00045    {
00046       readBegin(in, "McMoveManager");
00047 
00048       initFactory();
00049  
00050       std::string name;
00051       McMove* mcMovePtr;
00052 
00053       // Loop over McMoves 
00054       bool isEnd = false;
00055       while (!isEnd) {
00056 
00057          readBlank(in);
00058 
00059          // Read and instantiate a new McMove
00060          mcMovePtr = factory().readObject(in, *this, name, isEnd);
00061 
00062          if (!isEnd) {
00063             if (mcMovePtr != 0) {
00064                append(*mcMovePtr, name);
00065             } else {
00066               UTIL_THROW("McMove subclass name not recognized"); 
00067             }
00068          }
00069 
00070       }
00071 
00072       // Add closing bracket to param output format
00073       End* endPtr = &addEnd();
00074       if (ParamComponent::echo() && isParamIoProcessor()) { 
00075          endPtr->writeParam(Log::file());
00076       }
00077 
00078       probabilities_.allocate(size());
00079 
00080       // Store and normalize probabilities
00081       double  totalProbability = 0.0;
00082       int     iMove;
00083       for (iMove = 0; iMove < size(); ++iMove) {
00084          probabilities_[iMove] = (*this)[iMove].probability();
00085          totalProbability += probabilities_[iMove];
00086       }
00087       for (iMove = 0; iMove < size(); ++iMove) {
00088          probabilities_[iMove] = probabilities_[iMove]/totalProbability;
00089          (*this)[iMove].setProbability(probabilities_[iMove]);
00090       }
00091 
00092    }
00093 
00094    /*
00095    * Initialize all moves just prior to a run.
00096    */
00097    void McMoveManager::setup()
00098    {
00099       for (int iMove = 0; iMove < size(); ++iMove) {
00100          (*this)[iMove].setup();
00101       }
00102    }
00103 
00104    /*
00105    * Choose a McMove at random.
00106    */
00107    McMove& McMoveManager::chooseMove()
00108    {
00109       int iMove;
00110       iMove = randomPtr_->drawFrom(&probabilities_[0], size());
00111       return (*this)[iMove];
00112    }
00113 
00114    /*
00115    * Output statistics for every move.
00116    */
00117    void McMoveManager::output()
00118    {
00119       for (int i=0; i< size(); i++) {
00120          (*this)[i].output();
00121       }
00122    }
00123 
00124    /*
00125    * Save state to binary file archive.
00126    */
00127    void McMoveManager::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00128    {
00129       for (int i=0; i < size(); ++i) {
00130          (*this)[i].save(ar);
00131       }
00132    }
00133 
00134    /*
00135    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00136    */
00137    void McMoveManager::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00138    {
00139       for (int i=0; i < size(); ++i) {
00140          (*this)[i].load(ar);
00141       }
00142    }
